title: Shaka Senghor: Letters to the Sons of Society pt. 2
description: Oprah sits down with Shaka Senghor for part two of their powerful conversation. Oprah and Shaka go soul to soul as he shares what tested him during the pandemic and answers some of life's biggest questions.
author: podcasts@own.oprah.com (Oprah)
content:encoded: Oprah sits down with Shaka Senghor for part two of their powerful conversation. Oprah and Shaka go soul to soul as he shares what tested him during the pandemic and answers some of life's biggest questions.
